articles.title: ADB to help DMCs meet climate goals | Cai Ordinario - Business Mirror
articles.description: THE Asian Development Bank (ADB) has committed to help its Developing Member Countries (DMCs) to meet and even exceed their targets under the Paris Agreement. In a statement, ADB said this can be done by ensuring that 75 percent of the total number of ADB’s o…
articles.content:
THE Asian Development Bank (ADB) has committed to help its Developing Member Countries (DMCs) to meet and even exceed their targets under the Paris Agreement.

articles.title: Singapore moves on from Windows 7, mostly - Channel Asia Singapore
articles.description: ​Globally, 22 per cent of PC users continue to run the outdated Windows 7 operating system, but not in Singapore, where just 16 per cent of consumers and only 9.6 per cent of SMBs use the OS.
articles.content: Globally, 22 per cent of PC users continue to run the outdated Windows 7 operating system, but not in Singapore, where just 16 per cent of consumers and only 9.6 per cent of small- to medium-sized bu… [+4501 chars]
